description: AMENDMENT #03 TO SOLICITATION NUMBER W8476-246790 is raised to extend the tender closing date...
full_summary:
**Title:**
- Snow Blower Spare Parts
- Pièces de rechange pour souffleuses à neige

**Reference:** cb-737-55926571

**Solicitation Number:** W8476-246790

**Notice:** Solicitation for Snow Blower Spare Parts

**Status:** CLOSED - THIS NOTICE IS NO LONGER ACCEPTING BIDS.

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (Supply)

**Procurement Method:** Open Bidding

**Trade Agreements:** Please refer to Tender Documents

**Regions:** Canada

**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence

**Contact:** Marie-Claude Théorêt
Email: marie-claude.theoet@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (000) 000-0000

**Documents:**
[Attachments]
- w8476-246790---qa_01---eng.pdf
- w8476-246790_-_snow_blower_spare_parts_-_rfp.pdf
- w8476-246790---qa_02---eng_0.pdf
- w8476-246790---qa_03---eng.pdf
- w8476-246790---ddp_fr.pdf
- w8476-246790---qr_02_fr.pdf
- w8476-246790---qr_01_fr.pdf
- w8476-246790---qr-03_fre.pdf

**Description:** The Department of National Defence has a requirement for Snow Blower Spare parts. The supplier is required to provide parts that meet the requirements outlined in Annex A - Statement of Requirement. Delivery is requested no later than March 31, 2024.

**Substitution Policy:** Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NSCM/CAGE they are offering.

**Language:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Electronic Submission:** Electronic submission of bids is required. Details on Electronic Submission of Bids are available in the RFP document.

**Deadline:** December 20, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time.

Please note that the bid submission is closed, and it is no longer possible to submit a bid for this request. All information requested in the original documentation has been submitted and is available in the attachments section above. 

The following UNSPSC categories apply to this solicitation:
* Mechanized ground support systems
* Blades or tooth or other cutting edges
